languages.text: "Ты попалась на старую удочку слуг Хаоса. Еретики часто пытаются смутить разум праведников, когда смерть заглядывает им в лицо. Впрочем, с сестрой Арджентой такой примитивный трюк вряд ли бы прошел".

"You have fallen for an old trick of the servants of Chaos. Heretics often try to confuse the minds of the righteous when they are facing death. However, such a crude ploy would hardly work on Sister Argenta."
languages.original_text: "Ты попалась на старую удочку слуг Хаоса. Еретики часто пытаются смутить разум праведников, когда смерть заглядывает им в лицо. Впрочем, с сестрой Арджентой такой примитивный трюк вряд ли бы прошел".

traits.locale_text: "You have fallen for an old trick of the servants of Chaos. Heretics often try to confuse the minds of the righteous when they are facing death. However, such a crude ploy would hardly work on Sister Argenta."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You have fallen for an old trick of the servants of Chaos. Heretics often try to confuse the minds of the righteous when they are facing death. However, such a crude ploy would hardly work on Sister Argenta."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “你中了混沌仆从的惯用把戏。异端分子濒死的时候，常常会试图蛊惑正义之人的思想。然而，这种拙劣的把戏，在阿洁塔修女面前完全是浪费时间。”
languages.original_text: "You have fallen for an old trick of the servants of Chaos. Heretics often try to confuse the minds of the righteous when they are facing death. However, such a crude ploy would hardly work on Sister Argenta."

traits.locale_text: “你中了混沌仆从的惯用把戏。异端分子濒死的时候，常常会试图蛊惑正义之人的思想。然而，这种拙劣的把戏，在阿洁塔修女面前完全是浪费时间。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Vous vous êtes laissée berner par un vieux tour des serviteurs du Chaos. Face à la mort, les hérétiques cherchent souvent à plonger l'esprit des justes dans la confusion. Un stratagème bien trop grossier pour abuser sœur Argenta. »
languages.original_text: "You have fallen for an old trick of the servants of Chaos. Heretics often try to confuse the minds of the righteous when they are facing death. However, such a crude ploy would hardly work on Sister Argenta."

traits.locale_text: « Vous vous êtes laissée berner par un vieux tour des serviteurs du Chaos. Face à la mort, les hérétiques cherchent souvent à plonger l'esprit des justes dans la confusion. Un stratagème bien trop grossier pour abuser sœur Argenta. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Ha caído en un viejo truco de los sirvientes del Caos. Los herejes a menudo intentan confundir las mentes de los justos cuando se enfrentan a la muerte. Sin embargo, una treta tan burda nunca funcionaría contra la Hermana Argenta».
languages.original_text: "You have fallen for an old trick of the servants of Chaos. Heretics often try to confuse the minds of the righteous when they are facing death. However, such a crude ploy would hardly work on Sister Argenta."

traits.locale_text: «Ha caído en un viejo truco de los sirvientes del Caos. Los herejes a menudo intentan confundir las mentes de los justos cuando se enfrentan a la muerte. Sin embargo, una treta tan burda nunca funcionaría contra la Hermana Argenta».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「渾沌の従者の常套手段にはめられているぞ。異端者は己の死を前にすると、正義の心を惑わせようとしてくるものだ。だが、そうした場当たり的な策謀など、シスター・アルジェンタの前にはほとんど意味を成さぬ」
languages.original_text: "You have fallen for an old trick of the servants of Chaos. Heretics often try to confuse the minds of the righteous when they are facing death. However, such a crude ploy would hardly work on Sister Argenta."

traits.locale_text: 「渾沌の従者の常套手段にはめられているぞ。異端者は己の死を前にすると、正義の心を惑わせようとしてくるものだ。だが、そうした場当たり的な策謀など、シスター・アルジェンタの前にはほとんど意味を成さぬ」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Ihr seid auf eine uralte List der Diener des Chaos hereingefallen. Wenn Ketzer dem Tod ins Gesicht sehen, versuchen sie oft, den Verstand der Rechtschaffenen zu verwirren. Doch eine solch krude List hat bei Schwester Argenta wohl kaum Aussicht auf Erfolg."
languages.original_text: "You have fallen for an old trick of the servants of Chaos. Heretics often try to confuse the minds of the righteous when they are facing death. However, such a crude ploy would hardly work on Sister Argenta."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr seid auf eine uralte List der Diener des Chaos hereingefallen. Wenn Ketzer dem Tod ins Gesicht sehen, versuchen sie oft, den Verstand der Rechtschaffenen zu verwirren. Doch eine solch krude List hat bei Schwester Argenta wohl kaum Aussicht auf Erfolg."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.original_text: "You have fallen for an old trick of the servants of Chaos. Heretics often try to confuse the minds of the righteous when they are facing death. However, such a crude ploy would hardly work on Sister Argenta."

languages.text: "Kaos'un hizmetkârlarının eski bir numarasıdır, sen de kanacakmışsın. Kâfirler, ölümle burun burunayken genellikle inananların akıllarını karıştırmaya çalışır. Böylesine çiğ bir numara, Rahibe Argenta'ya sökmez elbette."
languages.original_text: "You have fallen for an old trick of the servants of Chaos. Heretics often try to confuse the minds of the righteous when they are facing death. However, such a crude ploy would hardly work on Sister Argenta."

traits.locale_text: "Kaos'un hizmetkârlarının eski bir numarasıdır, sen de kanacakmışsın. Kâfirler, ölümle burun burunayken genellikle inananların akıllarını karıştırmaya çalışır. Böylesine çiğ bir numara, Rahibe Argenta'ya sökmez elbette."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
